text: This page describes the qualifying procedure for the 1984 UEFA European Under-16 Football Championship. 27 teams were divided into 8 groups of two, three and four teams each. The eight winners advanced to the quarterfinals, consisting in two-legged rounds. The four winners of the quarterfinals advanced to the final tournament. ==Group stage== ===Group 1=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !width=180|Team !width=20|Pld !width=20|W \---- \---- ===Second leg=== Yugoslavia won 2-1 on aggregate. \---- England won 5-1 on aggregate. \---- Soviet Union won 3-1 on aggregate. \---- West Germany won 6-2 on aggregate. ==References and notes== ==External links== *RSSSF.com *UEFA.com Qualifying Category:UEFA European Under-17 Championship qualification
